channel.title: Initio - Free, multipurpose html5 template by GetTemplate
channel.description: Recent content on Initio - Free, multipurpose html5 template by GetTemplate

item.description:
Hi there, I’m Jianfan, welcome to my site!

I am a PhD candidate of marine geochemistry.

My current works focus on:

Paleoceanography

Investigating marine variations during orbital and millennial climatic shifts through Uranium-series proxies in marine sediments.

  • Quantifying the lithogenic dust flux input to the ocean by U-Th isotopes.
  • Reconstruction of paleo ocean circulation by Pa/Th.
  • Exploring the impact of iron-fertilization on marine productivity.

Marine Geochemistry

Studying the burial patterns of components and elements at the seawater-sediment interface.
